situation: Raising grandson and he is being very difficult and not listening.  I also have a lot of medical iss

final_result.label: normal
final_result.response: That sounds really challenging. It’s wonderful that you’re so mindful of his energy and needs, even while dealing with your own health. Have you thought about indoor activities that can be fun for both of you, like crafts, simple cooking projects, or even some games? It might be a nice way to bond without too much physical strain.
